# aci_epg_useg_ip_attribute #

List existing ACI EPG uSeg IP Attribute objects with the [terraform query](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/query) command.

For more information about the usage see the official Hashicorp documentation for [importing existing resources in bulk](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/v1.14.x/import/bulk?page=import&page=bulk).

## API Information ##

* Class: [fvIpAttr](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/fvIpAttr/overview)

* Supported in ACI versions: 1.1(1j) and later.

* Distinguished Name Format: `uni/tn-{name}/ap-{name}/epg-{name}/crtrn/ipattr-{name}`

## GUI Information ##

* Location: `Tenants -> Application Profiles -> uSeg EPGs -> uSeg Attributes`

## Example Usage ##

The configuration snippet below shows an example for EPG uSeg IP Attribute with only required attributes.

```hcl
list "aci_epg_useg_ip_attribute" "example" {
  provider = aci
}
```

The configuration snippet below shows an example for EPG uSeg IP Attribute with filter capabilties.

```hcl
list "aci_epg_useg_ip_attribute" "example" {
  provider = aci
  config {
    filter = "query-target-filter=eq(fvIpAttr.dn,\"uni/tn-{name}/ap-{name}/epg-{name}/crtrn/ipattr-{name}\")"
  }
}
```

## Schema ##

### Optional ###

* `config` - (map) A map that contains all configurable options for the list resource.
    
    ### Optional ###

    * `filter` - (string) A filter to restrict the results of the class query to APIC. See [Cisco APIC REST API Configuration Guide, Release 4.2(x) and Later](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/dcn/aci/apic/all/apic-rest-api-configuration-guide/cisco-apic-rest-api-configuration-guide-42x-and-later/m_using_the_rest_api.html#concept_1B75A78853DD46AABC15B048AAFAD1AD) for more information about composing filter query expressions.
